column5: Hi Everyone! It has been awhile since I have been on the board, I have not had much time to myself due with the xmas season here, and most days I don't know whether I am coming or going right now. I wanted to share some exciting news with all of you....  I got a phone call Friday night from my mom and she annouced that my brother-in-law is now back home on his 2 week leave from Afghanistan! I called him the next day and he sounds really great! He was not supposed to come home until the 20th but he came home early to surprise my sister. So it seems that our Christmas wish came true, it is just too bad that he has to go back in the beginning of Jan but that is his job and it is something that we have to deal with.  Also, I got a phone call last night from my sister and she told me that she is in the early stages of labour! This is their first child which is not due until the 24th but at least he is now home to be there for the birth of their first one, we were hoping that the baby would wait to make his/her apperance until the daddy came home. So there is alot going on for us this Christmas, Now all I have to do is sit and wait for the great news...I couldn't have asked for better Christmas gifts, he is home safe and well with us and I will have a new niece or nephew to love and spoil.

WOW!!!!  Congrats on both fronts!!!!  Made extra special that daddy can be home during the holidays and the birth of their first child.  Cant think of a better Christmas than that!!!!  Anyways...hopefully we catch up in person during the next few weeks...
Definately a Christmas to remember!
Awesome news and please thank him for me for his efforts over seas! He deserves to have a great Xmas! HH
Thanks Snag and Headhunter! I will for sure thank him for you!  Thank you for your support ccmt,snag and headhunter
Well that is fantastic news.  Make sure you take lots of pictures and enjoy every moment.  Cheers  Joey
Awesome news, family is what Christmas is all about.....
Thanks Joey and John, and you are 100% correct family is what Christmas is all about. I don't care about gifts, as long as I have my family and they are safe and well, that is all I care about!
Thats great news! Give them the congrats and a BIG THANKS to your bro in law for his Brave efforts. "We salute You!"  SUPPORT OUR TROUPS.
All the best to you and your family Your brother in law is of the brave few Hope you get a Christmas Neice/nephwie  MERRY CHRISTMAS

Thank you Disspatcher! I will for sure pass your message on to him. He finishes his tour in Feburary sometime.  Thanks Biteme! Ther support on here is wonderful and I would be lying if I said that reading these posts was not making me tear up. Thank you.    Merry Christmas to you too
Great news!!  Thanks for sharing some of your Holiday Joy with us!  Hope everything goes well with mom and baby!  Tell your bro..thanks!  blyght
Thanks Blyght! I will for sure tell him that. It was so good to hear his voice again.
congrats, happy for your brother in laws safe return, wish em the best And when i stop over with your guys presents there better be some cold beer in that fridge
Thanks Ernie! and as for the beer....well tell fishindevil that.LOL.  that is about the only responsibilty he has at home, to make sure that there are cold ones in the fridge.
Awesome news Fishergirl!  Merry Christmas,  Pete
A big oopps.LOL. I thought that I was still logged in but it was fishindevil that was.LOL. Thanks Pete!  Merry Christmas to you too!
Merry Christmas ... and again Merry Christmas.   Glad he's home safe and sound.
congrats!  nothing beats family @ christmas!  I'm going to be an uncle on thursday and cant' wait!  Happy holidays uf

My thanks to your Bro-in-law and all his comrades for their work over there. a friends son has just been posted,so I know how you must feel.  I bet you could'nt have organized your Christmas any better. Hope you and yours have good one!!!!

That is great news Fishergirl - that is an amazing gift for the holidays.  All the best on the delivery of the baby too - hope all goes well and it is a healthy little one.  Merry Christmas to you guys.  Please give your brother in law our thanks too for all his efforts.

Yes, congrats on the great news that he is home to see his first born come into the world. Nothing quite like it! A true gift in more ways than one!  Please pass along our thanks to him as well! We owe those men and women a ton of gratitude for what they do!

Thanks Rich, and a Merry Christmas to you too!  Thanks Urban Fisherman, I know what you mean I have been sitting on the edge of my seat since I found out that she is now in the hospital>LOL  Merry Christmas  Thank you very much Nanook, Steve Paul and Rattletrap2! I will for sure pass on the messages of thanks to him. Merry Christmas to you all and your families!
